snippet: Defense lawyers said they would not challenge a finding that their client is mentally fit. In 2010, a mistrial was declared when he became psychotic during jury selection.
abstract: Defense lawyers said they would not challenge a finding that their client is mentally fit. In 2010, a mistrial was declared when he became psychotic during jury selection.

headline.main: Another Trial Is Scheduled for Man Charged in 2008 Killing of Psychologist
headline.print_headline: Another Trial Is Scheduled for Man Charged in ’08 Killing of Psychologist
